extension.description: VS Code extension cho cac thao tac SCM thong minh - Tao thong diep commit da ngon ngu voi ho tro AI (25 ngon ngu) va cac tinh nang quan ly PR trong tuong lai.
command.changeLanguage: Thay Doi Ngon Ngu Thong Diep Commit
command.changeMessageStyle: Thay Doi Kieu Thong Diep Commit
command.diagnoseStorage: Chan Doan Luu Tru API Key
config.language: Ngon ngu cho thong diep commit
config.messageStyle: Kieu va do dai cua thong diep commit duoc tao
config.messageStyle.simple: Don gian va ngan gon (200 ky tu)
config.messageStyle.normal: Do dai binh thuong co mot chut ngu canh (400 ky tu)
config.messageStyle.detailed: Giai thich chi tiet (800 ky tu)
config.customMessage: Thong diep tuy chinh de them vao system prompt (them sau diff message)
config.useEmoji: Su dung emoji trong thong diep commit va mo ta PR
config.emojiStyle: Kieu emoji su dung trong thong diep
config.reasoningEffort: Muc reasoning effort cua GPT-5.2 (anh huong chat luong va do tre)
config.reasoningEffort.none: Khong reasoning (nhanh nhat, chat luong thap nhat)
config.reasoningEffort.low: Reasoning thap (nhanh, chat luong tot) - De xuat
config.reasoningEffort.high: Reasoning cao (cham nhat, chat luong cao nhat)
config.maxInputTokens: So token dau vao toi da cho AI xu ly (mac dinh: 200K)
config.useConventionalCommits: Su dung dinh dang Conventional Commits voi scope (<type>(<scope>): <subject>)
config.appendCommitTrailer: Them dong 'Commit-Message-By: otak-committer' vao cuoi thong diep commit da tao
config.syncApiKeys: Dong bo API key qua VS Code Settings Sync (luu key trong trang thai mo rong duoc dong bo)
